reference:
ASOS download from Iowa Environmental Mesonet,
https://mesonet.agron.iastate.edu/request/download.phtml.
title: Hourly weather data
description:
Description
Hourly meterological data for LGA, JFK and EWR.

parameters.time_hour: Date and hour of the recording as a POSIXct date.
parameters.wind_dir, wind_speed, wind_gust:
Wind direction (in degrees), speed
and gust speed (in mph).
parameters.origin:
Weather station. Named origin to facilitate merging with
flights data.
